title: Halloween 2019: Paris Hilton defies Playboy theme with sexy sailor costume
text:
‘The only rule is don’t be boring and dress cute wherever you go’ – Paris (Picture: iamKevinWong.com / BACKGRID)

Paris Hilton dressed up as a sexy sailor for StassieBaby’s Halloween party and we’re impressed by the amount of tiny costumes she owns.

The socialite rocked the boat with her black sailor outfit that showed off her legs, because that’s the only way to man a ship.

She attended Kylie Jenner’s best friend Anastasia Karanikolaou’s spooky Halloween party and gave us the most 2009 Paris poses.

As Paris would say: ‘That’s hot!’

It’s not even Halloween yet and the 38-year-old has already attended several ghostly bashes as many sexy versions of uniforms from normal occupations.

Sexy schoolgirl? Check. Sexy She-Ra? Check. Sexier-than-usual burlesque dancer? Check.

We wonder what her main costume will be when Halloween actually rolls around on Thursday.

Sunglasses to block out the haters (Picture: iamKevinWong.com / BACKGRID)

The theme of Anastasia’s party was ‘Playboy’ so it’s no surprise that Paris decided to one-up everyone by wearing whatever the heck she wanted.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Fair play, Paris.

While the Playboy bunnies were hopping around, the part-time DJ had her work cut out for her manning the ship.

The party was attended by YouTubers Tana Mongeau and Jake Paul (who dressed up as 2001 AMA’s Britney Spears and Justin Timberlake), Kylie Jenner (who was probably the sexiest bunny there), Nikita Dragon, French Montana, Kelsey Calemine, and uh, her dad.

The entire ordeal looked super lavish and we wish we got an invite.

Paris recently dressed up as a schoolgirl for Demi Lovato’s pre-Halloween party on Saturday evening.

This is like if Mean Girls was in a private school (Picture: NEMO/ CPR / BACKGRID)

The star wore a plaid mini-skirt with a ridiculously tight white top and sweater.

Her outfit, however, was beaten by host Demi’s Marie Antoinette costume.

She was in full glam complete with pearl makeup embellishments, a giant dusty blonde wig, and a very short version of a Georgian-era dress.

Sharing her costume on Instagram, the singer posted: ‘Halloween round 1… I told y’all I don’t play on Halloween!! It’s my time to shine.’

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

MORE: Heidi Klum and husband Tom Kaulitz sparkle so much they struggle to make camera focus at Paris Hilton bash
description: Paris Hilton looked phenomenal arrived as a sexy sailor to StassieBaby's Playboy Halloween party because who needs to follow a theme.
